title: Ticket #2756: Kill Pre 6.3 code in ReliSock/SafeSock::serialize
description:
• ReliSock::serialize in /src/condor_io/reli_sock.cpp around line 863
  • SafeSock::serialize in /src/condor_io/safe_sock.cpp around line 815
